content.prompt: Write a function that takes four parameters (a string s1, two ints,i and j, and another string s2) and replaces all of the characters of s1 between i (inclusive) and j (exclusive)with s2. If j is equal to or longer than the length of s1, replace everything in s1 from i to the end of the string with s2.For example:replaceAtIndex('knox college', 4, 10, ' villa') => 'knox village'replaceAtIndex('knox college', 5, 100, 'rocks') => 'knox rocks'replaceAtIndex('monmouth college', 0, 100, '') => ''
content.source_code:
[student_code]
